roadmap.already_auth: Already registered? Great! Then start your work with the data category you need!
roadmap.auth_patient: Already registered? Great! Then you are one step closer to your destination! Follow the link below, after which you will find yourself in your already familiar personal account!
roadmap.new_admin: As a new administrator, you should have been provided with authorization data! Follow the link below to further authorize in the system, after which you will find yourself in the dashboard!
roadmap.choose_data: On the pages for data other than centers, we have the opportunity to select the data that belongs to a specific center! To work with the desired center, simply select the necessary one in the drop-down list!
roadmap.let_us_know_longtext: First, you need to inform us about your desire to be connected to the system! Follow the link below, fill in the contact fields with your email and write in the message your goals, name and address! We will definitely contact you as soon as possible to resolve the working issues!
roadmap.auth_employee: Already registered and have employee status? Great! Go to your personal account page, check your personal data, and also adjust your work schedule!
roadmap.end_of_registration: After completing registration in your personal account, among the tabs on the left you can click on the link <Scheduled sessions>, where you can view the appointments for sessions assigned to you and other specialists!
roadmap.patients_link: In your personal account, among the tabs on the left, select the link <Patients>, where you can find a list of patients assigned to you with whom you have created sessions. Here you will find all the information you need about their medical data, which you can review at any time!
roadmap.function_chat: Also among the important functions is the ability to chat with other employees and/or patients! Quickly find the user you need, initiate a dialogue, and inform him about important or just work information! Also, other patients can send you a request to start a conversation - you have the right to accept or withdraw it.
roadmap.check_your_account_data: On the personal account page, check your personal data, and also adjust your work schedule!
roadmap.notify_administrator_employee: When you register in this system, notify the administrator about assigning you the status of an employee. After that, you can work fully!
roadmap.firstly_auth: First, you need to register in this system! Follow the link below, fill in the fields with your last name, first name and email, after which you will be taken to your personal account!
roadmap.enter_account: Log in to your personal account
roadmap.patient_stay_in_touch: You will be contacted within a certain time! You may be asked to bring your medical data with you (if they are in physical form), or enter them into the system yourself if possible! You will also be asked about your complaints or wishes in a personal chat with you! Your previous record will probably be clarified and supplemented, so don't worry if it changes! Follow the updates, you will be sent a corresponding message!
roadmap.patient_end_auth: After clicking on the <I want to you!> button, a window will open with the specified center and additional fields (such as your address, phone number, etc.). After filling in these fields, click on the <Save> button. After that, you will be on the your own account, but already a patient assigned to the selected Center.
roadmap.patient_choose_procedure: In your personal account, among the tabs on the left, select the link <Procedures>, where you can find a list of procedures available in the center, and choose exactly the one that interests you. When you select, a page will open for you with the opportunity to sign up for it. Choose a time and doctor, click <Save>, after which your record will be created!
roadmap.patient_choose_center: On the personal account page, select the link <Centers> among the tabs on the left. When you click on it, you will be taken to a page with all the centers listed in the system, and all of them are available for your choice! Choose yours by finding it by address, and click on the button <I want to you!>
roadmap.patient_already_auth: Already registered? Great! Then you are one step closer to your appointment! Follow the link below for further authorization in the system, after which you will find yourself in the already familiar To your personal account!

pages.about_us_p2: Our task is to provide you with every opportunity to restore your health!

pages.help_hero_p2: Оберіть інструкцію користувача та обов'язково перегляньте секцію FaQ!
pages.you_have_opportunity: Here you can find the help you need to restore your health!

pages.rehab_programs: Rehabilitation programs tailored to individual needs and preferences
